Room.Name: Appleton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Appleton Road between the ranch and slaughterhouse.
Room.LongDescription: The Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch is located to the east of the road where the cattle are born, fed and nurtured, and then shipped across Appleton Road to the Slaughterhouse where they are humanely destroyed and sold to the civilians as meat for their daily diets. The large number of cattle that go through the Slaughterhouse daily leaves a nice river of blood running down Appleton Road.
